about_the_game:
"Buddy Bug" is a creative rogue-lite adventure game where players step into the shoes of tiny insects exploring a miniature world within a bustling city. Experience their struggles for survival and immerse yourself in a vibrant and refreshing journey.

Explore a Microscopic Insect World:

Embark on an extraordinary adventure as a humble little bug in a parallel world that exists alongside the human realm yet feels entirely unique. Face countless challenges and seize unexpected opportunities as you uncover the surprises hidden in every scene. Along the way, you'll meet diverse insect companions and experience a whimsical journey filled with wonder and imagination.

Local & Online Co-op Mode:

Buddy Bug introduces a special two-player co-op mode available both Local and Online, allowing you to team up with friends and face challenges together. Players can choose two distinct insect characters and combine their unique abilities through teamwork and synchronized strategies to tackle more complex missions. Each character has its own special skills, and how well you utilize these abilities to complement one another will determine whether you can successfully overcome the game's many obstacles.

Various Combat Gadgets:

The game is filled with ingenious, handcrafted tools. Whether it's turning thumbtacks into roadblocks or transforming a lighter into a weapon, you'll creatively utilize resources that insects can find to overcome challenges and complete your adventure.

Diverse Skills and Gadget Combinations:

As you progress through battles and exploration, you'll become familiar with a variety of skills and tools. Each skill branch has its own unique traits, offering distinct advantages. In two-player co-op mode, clever combinations of abilities can help you overcome even stronger enemies and conquer more complex environments.

The game is currently in its DEMO stage, and as development progresses, player feedback will play a vital role in shaping a series of major updates. These updates will introduce new features, characters, weapons, tools, regions, and much more. Welcome to Buddy Bug! Step into the insect world, team up with friends, and create your own heroic legend!

name: Buddy Bug
short_description: In a microscopic insect world tucked away in a corner of the city, gather your friends, fight bravely, and use all sorts of innovative gadgets to carve out your own territory. In this cooperative, rogue-lite game, you will embark on an exciting and exhilarating journey.
